section.p: Complications associated with a procedure performed by the EMS unit

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11526 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.179"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11259)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10528)/@code="67545-4" Procedure complication NEMSIS (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10529)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:11622), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureComplicationType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.58 DYNAMIC (CONF:10530)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.07
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11259)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10528)/@code="67545-4" Procedure complication NEMSIS (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10529)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:11622), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureComplicationType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.58 DYNAMIC (CONF:10530)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.07

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.179"/> <code code="67545-4" displayName="Procedure complication NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
